metadata.synopsis: Zevlor is on his own during the camp celebration. He's standing, gazing out at the party and quietly reflecting to himself.

0.speaker: Zevlor
0.text: Is this everyone? Our numbers have grown so few...
0.context: NodeContext: Apart and looking out at revellers, slightly sad

1.speaker: Zevlor
1.text: No. Let them have fun. I'll be ruining it come morning anyway.

2.speaker: Zevlor
2.text: I should be out there, talking with them. In... just a moment, maybe.
2.context: NodeContext: Quietly gathering himself to go out and socialise with people.

3.speaker: Zevlor
3.text: No more. I can't afford to lose any more of them.
3.context: NodeContext: Making a quiet promise to himself not to let any more of his people die
